titles.title: To amend the Emergency Steel Loan Guarantee Act of 1999 to clarify the definition of qualified steel company under that Act.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Domestic Monetary Policy, Technology and Economic Growth.

committee.subcommittee: Domestic Monetary Policy, Technology, and Economic Growth
committee.name: House Financial Services

bill.summary: 12/11/2001--Introduced. Amends the Emergency Steel Loan Guarantee Act of 1999 to extend the definition of a steel company qualified for a loan guarantee to a company that has placed on hot idle status any steel mill facilities used in production and manufacture of a basic steel mill product.
